Portfolio

About Blaze

Hello, I am Blaze Fugina, a web developer based in the Twin Cities. After working in the field of journalism for most of my 20s, I decided to make a career switch to software development. After graduating from Prime Digital Academy, a programming boot camp based in the Twin Cities, I was hired to my current position as a front-end developer at Turnkey Corrections/Three Square Market.

Aside from my fulltime work, I also enjoy cross-country skiing, snowboard and playing tennis. As you can tell, I love the cold and snowy winters we often get in the Upper Midwest. I am always looking for a new challenge, so feel free to reach out with any requests for freelance help. Or just to say hi. To reach out, use the email address listed below.

Location

Cottage Grove, Minnesota

Around the Web

About Blaze

For more information, check out my social media links.

Turnkey Corrections

I have spent more than two years as a fullstack software developer for Turnkey Corrections. I have helped develop software like the website you see above to help inmates and jail residents connect with their friends and family.

Nordic Race Track

Nordic skiing is my passion. I spend most of my year training for the marathon ski races I enjoy competing in once the weather turns code. And to help keep track of results, I developed a website for tracking cross-country ski results. Now you can keep track of your percent back for each race all in one place.
